_source.text: 7) If you can embrace (not just accept) the perfect imperfections of marble's living surface, then you and marble are a match made in marble heaven 8) Honed marble is infinitely better for kitchens because it doesn't show etching nearly as much 9) Marble has been used as all sorts of surfaces from counters to tables to bars and stairs in Europe for centuries.

7) If you can **embrace** (not just accept) the perfect imperfections of marble's living surface, then
you and marble are a match made in marble heaven 8) Honed marble is infinitely **better** for kitchens
